Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CIVIL SERVICE AND PENSIONS

Title: Relates to procedures and other matters related to the receipt or discontinuation of certain benefits
Summary: Requires that all procedures and other matters related to the receipt or discontinuation of benefits available under section two hundred seven-c of the general municipal law shall be mandatorily negotiable terms and conditions of employment.
LawCode: Amd ยง201, Civ Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the civil service law, in relation to procedures and other matters related to the receipt or discontinuation of certain benefits
